title: BRIEF-Associated International Hotels Sees HY Loss Before Taxation Of About HK$331 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Associated International Hotels Sees HY Loss Before Taxation Of About HK$331 Mln

Stock Markets 58 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 23:28)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Associated International Hotels Sees HY Loss Before Taxation Of About HK$331 Mln Oct 21 (Reuters) - Associated International Hotels Ltd : * EXPECTED THAT TTLL INTERIM RESULTS AND AIHL INTERIM RESULTS WILL BOTH RECORD A LOSS BEFORE TAXATION FOR SIX MONTHS * EXPECTED THERE WILL BE SLIGHT DECREASE IN RESULTS FROM NORMAL BUSINESS OPERATIONS OF TTLL GROUP & AIHL GROUP FOR 6 MONTHS * EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO INCREASE IN NET VALUATION LOSSES IN RESPECT OF THEIR INVESTMENT PROPERTIES * EXPECTED AIHL GROUP WILL RECORD A LOSS BEFORE TAXATION OF ABOUT HK$331 MILLION FOR SIX MONTHS * EXPECTED THAT TTLL GROUP WILL RECORD A LOSS BEFORE TAXATION OF APPROXIMATELY HK$333 MILLION FOR 6 MONTHS

BRIEF-Associated International Hotels Sees HY Loss Before Taxation Of About HK$331 Mln
description: BRIEF-Associated International Hotels Sees HY Loss Before Taxation Of About HK$331 Mln
